title: DeepLabCut is not using GPUs
body:
**Describe the bug**

even though I have set gputouse=0 it is not using the GPU 0.

```
deeplabcut.train_network(path_config_file, shuffle=1, displayiters=100,saveiters=100,gputouse=0,maxiters=1000000)
(base) [jalal@goku openfield-Pranav-2019-12-04]$ nvidia-smi
Wed Dec  4 16:43:03 2019

| NVIDIA-SMI 418.67       Driver Version: 418.67       CUDA Version: 10.1     |

|===============================+======================+======================|
|   0  GeForce GTX 108...  Off  | 00000000:05:00.0  On |                  N/A |
|  0%   27C    P8    17W / 250W |   1375MiB / 11178MiB |      1%      Default |
+-------------------------------+----------------------+----------------------+
|   1  GeForce GTX 108...  Off  | 00000000:06:00.0 Off |                  N/A |
|  0%   28C    P8    13W / 250W |     12MiB / 11178MiB |      0%      Default |
```
